title: Remove car/bus/charging-station animations and visuals from the hero scene

requirements.text: Remove the animated background traffic elements from the landing hero, including the car animation and the bus element/animation.

quotes: remove the car animations  and the bus and charging station also

acceptanceCriteria: The landing hero no longer renders /assets/generated/car-sprite.dim_512x256.png.
The landing hero no longer renders /assets/generated/bus-sprite.dim_768x320.png.
No CSS keyframes/classes remain that are only used for the removed car/bus animations (e.g., slide-right)

requirements.text: Remove the charging station element (and any associated charging sequence UI/animation) from the landing hero experience.

quotes: remove the car animations  and the bus and charging station also

acceptanceCriteria: The landing hero no longer renders /assets/generated/charger-station.dim_512x512.png.
The landing hero no longer shows the 'Charging...' label or the charging progress animation.

Any now-unused React state/effects/refs related only to the removed charging/driving sequence are removed (e.g., animationPhase/canvasRef/useEffect), and the component compiles cleanly with no unused-variable lint/type errors

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Do not add external APIs or services
nonGoals: Do not change the Range Confidence Demo calculations or UI behavior outside of removing the specified hero visuals/animations
Do not change backend canister logic or data models
Do not delete generated image files from the repository; only remove their usage from the UI
